name: Maximum Relation View Height
author: Fiberflow <fiberflow.io@gmail.com> (https://fiberflow.io)
description: Set the maximum height of the relation view of a relation field.

fields.label: Fields
fields.tooltip: The relation fields to apply maximum height to.

maxHeight.label: Maximum Height (px)
maxHeight.tooltip: The maximum height in pixels for the relation view.

fieldId.label: Field
fieldId.tooltip: Limit this rule to a specific relation field. If not set, applies to all relation fields.

viewType.label: View Type
viewType.tooltip: Limit this rule to a specific view type. If not set, applies to all view types.
